metadata.title: CVE-2022-0496 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerbiility was found in Openscad, where a DXF-format drawing withparticular (not necessarily malformed!) properties may cause anout-of-bounds memory access when imported using import().

criterions.comment: openscad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
